acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited on [17 Dec 1963]5 Nov 1964.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter, Richard Hildreth writes to Putnam's Magazineand comments on proofs received of " Irving's WashingtonVol. 2nd." Cites missing pages and is apparently critical of scope of material. 2 p. ALS.
